      • uploadfile

        private void uploadfile(java.util.List<byte[]> byteArray,
                        java.util.List<java.lang.String> filelist)
        Parameters:
        byteArray - it consist a list of all compress images that we have selected to sent
        filelist - it consist a list of url for all the mediafiles that we have selected to sent A api to upload these files on the server is also executed here

      • movefiles

        public static void movefiles(java.lang.String url,
                             java.lang.String filetype,
                             java.lang.String filename)
        When user sent any media type as a message to the user than that particular media file is move in a sperate folder on the basis of their file type using async task inbackground.
        Parameters:
        url - the url of the media file
        filetype - Type of the media file i.e. Image, Documnet, Audio, Video, Location, Contact
        filename - Name of the media file that that user selects to send

      • compressimage

        private void compressimage(java.lang.String imguri)
        Function to compress image
        Parameters:
        imguri - Url of the image that we want to compress

      • publishimage

        private void publishimage(java.lang.String imageurl,
                          java.lang.Integer imageid,
                          java.lang.String filename)
        This function publish the file on the mqtt server
        Parameters:
        imageurl - Url of the image
        imageid - Id of the file from the db
        filename - Name of the file

        public static void onTrigger(java.lang.String message)
                      throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

        Throws:
